title: Access bookmarks from dead computer
content: My old computer (Windows 10) finally died, beyond economic (or even possible) repair. The SSDs on it have been copied. How do I access and restore the bookmarks from the drive copy to my new PC (Windows 11).

title: Failed to check for updates
content:
Good morning:

When I click on Help and then About Firefox I see the message 'Checking for updates' and then I get 'Failed to check for updates'

I have manually installed FF 115.2.1 and know 115.3.0 is available. Using Win10 and FireFox is on a portable USB stick

Attached are a screen shot and the Enterprise Policies.

What am I missing?

thanks Norbert
creator: Norbert38

title: Firefox cannot open local files
content:
When I open a website where there is a document upload feature and I want to upload a document but when I click the button to upload a document Firefox can't respond, I've tried several methods such as deleting cache, even reinstalling but I still encounter this problem.

I can't add images to this report because of this problem

Thank you
creator: anjarwilujeng8

title: Firefox search suggestions won't turn off
content:
Dear all, I have unchecked all the boxes in "Settings/Search/Search Suggestions" and disabled history for the search engine and yet Firefox still displays search suggestions in the address bar. They even have a small header called "Firefox Suggest". How can I turn this off? Thanks for your help, Markus

Windows 11 Home 22H2 FF 118.0.1 (64-bit)

Default search engine is Google
creator: toegelmarkus

title: Where is my separate STOP and RELOAD button
content:
There used to be a solution via userChrome.css:

/* separate stop and reload buttons */

  1. reload-button, #stop-button { 
 display: -moz-box !important;

}

The above workaround no longer provides separate stop and reload buttons on the browser in the latest version of firefox.
creator: jerriy1

title: Firefox unstable
content: I cannot stream china open tennis via tennis tv - login problems, crashing problems. Unresponsive to login details Sometimes I can log in but then cannot open specific matches Other times the screen just goes blank There is an account login icon in lower left hand corner of the screen, but if I try to refresh the screen the icon changes its nature and does not respond, then I cannot log in or out It is random and unreliable when I am trying to stream the tennis I have never had this problem with this website before, and I have been a subscriber for 5 years The first two photos are how the login icon should look. The third shows what is happening to the login icon The fourth photo is the blank screen that I sometimes get and cannot move away from - the screen is stuck I really dont want to have to use Safari and definitely not Chrome Sherrill Carta shcarta@gmailcom
creator: shcarta

title: No 'success page' for Mailerlite embedded sign-up form on Firefox, works with other browsers
content:
Hello,

I'm setting up Mailerlite sign-up forms on my Wordpress website https://jilldobsonwriter.com. (I'm using the HTML option because I can't get the Mailerlite plugin to work for me. That's a whole other story.)

The URL on the landing page produces the sign-up 'success' message.

The embedded form on the blog page (https://jilldobsonwriter.com/blog-2/) does not.

I have attached a screenshot of the webpage that appears (https://assets.mailerlite.com/jsonp/521838/forms/95057252703012500/subscribe).

This doesn't happen on Microsoft Edge.

My guess is that Firefox and Mailerlite aren't playing nicely, hence a subscriber gets this 'under the bonnet' view rather than being progressed straight through to the success message.

And yes, everything is updated.

Any thoughts?

Thanks!

-Sei
creator: jill_dobson2002

title: bookmarks thumbnails
content:
Hello, what's wrong with the bookmarks thumbnails, that they don't display properly (not as the site's logo), only some default ones that look ugly. Only some tabs have thumbnails. I have freshly installed firefox on a new PC and I've been using it for another day and nothing changes, I visit these websites constantly and these icons still look like this. It will stay like this or is it some browser error ?

Greetings

Tom
creator: bruno.funkyzeit

title: New translator feature
content: Your new translation feature is great, by any chance do you have simplified Chinese or will that be coming in the future?
creator: richs

title: Upon update to v118 lost all Bookmarks, no restore
content:
upgraded to v118 9'30 Bookmarks lost and not able to access old profile, or restore using "Manage Bookmarks"

See attached: Only see one real profile (current, new) in App Support > Firefox > Profiles. The second profile that exists has virtually nothing in it compared to the new one created upon upgrade. Only three tiny files key4,cert9,pkcs11. Nothing else to restore from.

Bookmark manager >> restore >> despite seeing 10 dates to chose form , error messages every time, "unable to process the backup file." Now what?

I do see a "places.sqlite" file which seems to show "last modified" date of prior to my unfortunate update. But when I try to have Firefox open it, nothing happens. Just new browser windows every time.

THX in advance.
creator: srih4

title: Extension syncing
content: Is there any plan to be able to sync what extensions are being used and their current settings between desktop and mobile?
creator: Thomas.kitchens

title: Missing Profile, settings and data - extentions, bookmarks, passwords etc
content: Due to a Windows 11 system restore, I had to reinstall Firefox. After signing in I found that all bookmarks, extensions and passwords have gone and the original 2020 profile they were attached to seems to be missing as well. I initially installed the Firefox app from the windows store and thought that might have been the problem, so uninstalled it and reinstalled from the mozilla website. That didn't heelp so I went through all the help articles I could find and I still can't figure out how to restore anything.
creator: plantshateme

title: Kaspersky Password manager does not work anymore with Firefox.
content: I have used Firefox for years and also use Kaspersky as my security along with Kaspersky's password manager. Recently, after a Firefox upgrade, while using Firefox to access websites using passwords it will not auto fill from Kaspersky. I have the extension installed. Kaspersky works on all other browsers.
creator: gwwebb30

title: Lag, replay
content: When I am streaming TV shows or movies online using Firefox the timer in bottom left corner is is not going up by one. It seems that since the net framework updates in the past 3 days have updated in Firefox which is now causing my computer to act like a virus. The show will glitch and repeat 2 to 5 seconds worth of time. Seems you all need to check your crap with Microsoft to update your Firefox.
creator: blairhanna.2230

title: You tube video problems
content: For some time now I have been having trouble with viewing you tube video's. At times the video freezes or just sort of locks up. But, I don't have the same problem with other browsers, Chrome, Brave. So, it just seems with Firefox this issue pertains. Can some one please help so I don't experience the Firefox you tube problems. Thank you.
